basics.name: Srinivasa Rao Sodavaram
basics.label: Digital Innovation Evangelist
basics.summary:
• Effective leader with 11 years of rapid advancement in digital innovation, cloud computing, DevOps, artificial intelligence, machine learning and product development leadership. Known for harnessing digital product, process and project in support of business strategy and for delivering cross-functional, rapid prototyping capability to push and test new value propositions in the market fast.
  • Experience in defining technical architectures for enterprise, products, services and technology that follow industry standard best practices, TOGAF methodologies, utilization of business process management, Certified ScrumMaster®, AWS Certified Solution Architect
  • Played various roles as Innovation Architect, Digital Architect, Solution Architect, Technical Manager, Scrum Master, Agile Coach, Technical lead, Application designer, Web developer, programmer and Business analyst. Managed and closed turnkey projects delivering different solutions in Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, MEAN, ELK, ECM, WEM, WCM, Spring and J2EE.
  • Specialized in Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning, Cyber Security and Risk Management, Business and IT Alignment with Enterprise Architecture, Innovation, Transformative IT and Modernization Technologies including Cloud Computing, Product development, Continuous Integration (CI) & Continuous Delivery (CD), Web Services, Web 2.0, Agile Coach and Social Media, Project/Program Management and Mentoring.
  • Certified TOGAF® 9 Enterprise Architect, Certified ScrumMaster®, AWS Certified Solutions Architect, Certified Architect in Analytic, Adobe Certified Expert.

work.position: Software Architect - Aviva Agency Services Inc.
work.summary: To develop a new digital product to harness a voice user interface (VUI) for personal line auto insurance. To design and develop a brand new voice user interface using Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning using world’s best intelligent personal assistant Amazon Alexa Platform, accessible via natural voice commands on Amazon Echo device.  “Alexa, ask Aviva for an Auto Quote”. Using cloud-based voice service that interacts Aviva with on premise restful API to generate an Auto Quote and question and answering system.
highlights: Artificial Intelligence – A question and answering system using machine learning, voice-first experiences with toolkit, voice enabled device, voice user interface (VUI) design pattern, text-to-speech (TTS), interaction model, webhook, chat bots, using Solr, MEAN stack, python, AI.api, Raspberry Pi, hosted on AWS Lambda, Self-hosted web service, Amazon Alexa.
Machine Learning – Amazon automatic speech recognition (ASR) and natural language understanding (NLU), natural language processing (NLP), Amazon Alexa platform.

Product Development – Lead creation of culture and solutions that deliver business value and strategic benefit with the help of agile, lean, and DevOps. New product development (NDP) through idea, research, develop, testing, analysis and introduction leads to quick to market. Harnessing the power of continues integration (CI), continuous delivery (CD) and continuous improvement (Agile) during the process of new product development.

API Development – To create a new API for personal line Auto insurance restful API’s using microservice architecture and to leverage and to integrate existing Guidewire policy center for quote creation.
Information Security and Risk Management – To ensure incompliance with information security, risk management, penetration testing and vulnerability testing, mitigation and remediation plan.

Continuous Integration (CI) & Continuous deployment (CD) – To integrate code into a shared repository several times building pipeline and to push code updates through a series of testing and then automatically releases.

Cloud Computing & Environment Management – AWS Certified Solutions Architect using well-architected framework, in terms of security, reliability, performance, cost optimization. Creating repeatable test environment using Ansible, Amazon Web Service (AWS).

location.address: Aviva Canada Digital Garage, 100 King St W

projects.name: Network Solutions Terminal Software Product Development and Support
ATM Log parsing, analysis, and visualization

highlights: End to End Architecture for a net new digital Direct Insurance Portal leveraging wide spectrum of modern technologies, integrating with Guidewire Modern Insurance Suite were the core technology pillars for the target architecture.

Consultancy services for a leading Insurance carrier to evaluate and score minimum of 3 digital platforms against defined priorities and deliver extensive evaluation report with recommendations and roadmap.

Website platform transition to Oracle WebCenter deployment, migrating from old WCM to WebCenter Content, building the Portal framework, and deploying WebCenter suite across 5 environments 2 of which follows Oracle Enterprise Deployment Guidelines. Configured WebCenter content types & profiles, element & region definitions, and workflow. Implementing Information Architecture in terms of folder structure, metadata model, navigation, contribution model...etc. Implemented responsive page and display templates, and navigation based on HTML5 and CSS3 using Portal framework and content services.
Delivered high quality documentation that have been taken as benchmark for other projects.

education.institution: National Institute of Science and Technology
